content.raw:
The sdformat description and schema files are still installed into non-versioned folders in `<prefix>/share/sdformat/`, which doesn't matter for Ubuntu, since it installs those files in the `sdformat-sdf` package separately from the library, but it will keep side-by-side installs from working on homebrew, since it isn't doing that packaging trick.

This isn't a blocker, but I wanted to mention it.
